The history of the wars of Italy from the year MDCXIII to MDCXLIV in XVIII books / written originally in Italian, by Pietro Giovanni Capriata ... ; and rendred in English by Henry Earl of Monmouth. Dell'historia. English Capriata, Pier Giovanni. Monmouth, Henry Carey, Earl of, 1596-1661.
[13], 797 p. : port.
Printed by J. Macock, and are to be sold by Tho. Dring ..., London : 1663.
Translation of: Dell'Historia. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
